metadata.synopsis: One liner for a reporter on the ground floor of Baldurs Mouth.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to the reporters on the ground floor of the Baldur's Mouth building in CTY_Main_A

0.speaker: Ty Willowbrook
0.text: Father Lorgan's corpusculent... Err... corpse... Shit, no. Look, mate, can you stop staring at me? Really putting me off.

1.speaker: Ty Willowbrook
1.text: HANG ON! Wait, stay there. You've reminded me of that word I was looking for... cor... cor... corpusculent. That's it. As you were.
